org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.dao

Interface SearchDao<E,K extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - entity type
    K - entity key type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RecipeService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecipeHibernateService

    public interface SearchDao<E,K extends java.io.Serializable>
    Generic Interface that defines search methods usually needed.
    Author:
    Nils Sommer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<E> searchByKeywords(java.lang.String pattern)
      Searches for entities containing the given keyword(s).
      java.util.List<E> searchByKeywords(java.lang.String pattern, java.util.List<java.lang.String> attributes)
      Searches for entities containing the given keyword(s)s, but the search is only performed on the given entity attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • searchByKeywords

        java.util.List<E> searchByKeywords(java.lang.String pattern)
        Searches for entities containing the given keyword(s).
        Parameters:
        pattern - search pattern containing one or more keywords
        Returns:
        a list of entities

      • searchByKeywords

        java.util.List<E> searchByKeywords(java.lang.String pattern,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> attributes)
        Searches for entities containing the given keyword(s)s, but the search is only performed on the given entity attributes.
        Parameters:
        pattern - search pattern containing one or more keywords
        attributes - a list of the attributes of the entity to search on
        Returns:
        a list of entities
